Alert Name: bush
United States and  EU  ink 'open skies' deal
Deregulation of transatlantic routes to create flights between more cities in the United States and Europe.
04/30/07 05:44 PM, EDT
The United States and the European Union signed a landmark air services agreement Monday, opening up transatlantic markets to more competition beginning next year.
